channel.title: Pking
channel.description:
Ok i am a decent coder, and i have a very good server. I get a million ppl pming me ingame cause they like it so much... well what i am tryiog to say is im good, but there are cirtain things i know nothing about. can sum1 explain pking a bit?
ps: does ne1 have an emote list? like a full one, i wanna make npcs die the right way instead of like exploding out

item.title: Pking
item.dc:creator: @dracar dracar
item.description:
@dracar wrote:

hmm i cud probly answer that… maybe… just try like searching ur client for the edge coord of the safespot and like remove that stuff?[br][size=1]Posted on: February 13, 2007, 10:02:13 PM[/size][hr]and to whoever said look at a pk source, ok… i dont liek em so i never bothered but my freind wants a working cw so im gunna make it for him

item.title: Pking
item.dc:creator: @dracar dracar
item.description:
@dracar wrote:

-.- i was exagerating, andi ment last time i cleared my player files, i had over 10k diferent player files made, i didnt meen they all played at once, and i play rs i ment idk how pking is coded cause im new to java…

“AND dont say you was jokin please” thats my line…

I actualy post to help people here, and every time i ask for help you ppl flame me!! besides, most of u are 9 yo’s with no life so i dont wanna hear it. now answer this, i have the newest cache on my client and on my moparscape client and cannot find the pest control island and i cannot use ne of the newer items that other ppl can, like the easter rings so whats up with that?

Read full topic
